'''Resolution of Sojourner''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:3-Star Artifacts|3-star]] and [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Midsummer Courtyard]], [[Adventurer Handbook]], and [[Adventure Rank]] [[Adventure Rank/Adventurers' Guild Rewards|Rewards]] (17, 19, 21, 22, 23).

==Lore==
{{ArtifactLore}}

==Trivia==
* The lore for this Artifact set ties into the [[Wanderer's Troupe]], [[The Flute]] and [[The Widsith]].
*The lore seems to be referring to one of the members of the [[Wanderer's Troupe]]. More specifically, the wielder of [[The Stringless]].
